howItWorks.title: From Data to Relationships in 4 Steps
howItWorks.subtitle: Get started in minutes, not months

step1.title: Upload Your Customers
step1.desc: Import your existing customer list via CSV or add them manually. Include whatever data matters — birthdays, locations, preferences.

step2.title: Tell Us About Your Business
step2.desc: Share your business type, goals, and what success looks like. This context helps our AI make smarter suggestions.

step3.title: Review AI Suggestions
step3.desc: Our AI analyzes your data and proposes 5-10 tailored automations. Review each one, edit if needed, and approve with one click.

step4.title: Watch Relationships Grow
step4.desc: Automations run on your schedule. Customers receive personalized messages. You focus on what matters — your business.
